CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 25, 1949, pg. 3 reads: "Camp Fund - Mrs. Robert L. Vann, right, presents a $100 check from The Courier Charity Fund to Mrs. Alma Illery, founder and president of Camp Achievement Clubs of America, as Mrs. Daisy Lampkin looks on."
TitMainTitle: Alma Illery receiving check for Camp Achievement from Jessie Vann, with Daisy Lampkin looking on, posed in office interior with calendar and tropical picture on wall, possibly Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper office
